item.title: Notes: Feature Engineering Coursera Course
item.description: Raw Data to Features Features Known at Prediction-time Features should be Numeric and has meaningful magnitude Features Should Have Enough Examples Representing Features one-hot encoding (dummy variables): when numeric but magnitude doesn’t make sense or categorical tf.feature_column.categorical_column_with_vacabulary_list('employeeId',vacabulary_list=['8345','72345','87654']) tf.feature_column.categorical_column_with_identity('employeeId',num_buckets=5) tf.feature_column Missing: Flag(0,1) Discretize Scaling
